name: Lua Script
description: This algorithm allows you to run what are effectively scripted 'plug-ins', loaded from the MicroSD card. Such scripts are ideal for CV processing, especially for quirky little sequencers or generative things that are never going to be implemented as official algorithms because theyâ€™re so specific to your particular use case. Scripts are not intended for audio processing. If you want to implement custom DSP code, look at the Three Pot algorithm (below) or the C++ API (above).
short_description: Algorithm defined by a Lua script
gui_description: The interface is entirely script-defined, with parameters and routing determined by the loaded Lua file. The GUI will adapt to display whatever controls are specified in the script.
